article_title: Snapchat: 'How To Make $3 Billion-Or Was It $4 Billion-Disappear' (And Other Quotes Of The Week)

article_metadata.description: The Dow and the S&P put in all-time highs again this week, but some are wondering if the Snapchat story marked the apex of a current tech bubble.
article_metadata.author: David Wismer
